ygData.subject: RE: Looting LORE items
ygData.msgSnippet: What is the difference between an item that it tradable and one that is not? I think if an item is no-drop it is not tradable? At any rate, I wanted to switch
ygData.messageBody:
What is the difference between an item that it tradable and one that is not?
I think if an item is no-drop it is not tradable?

At any rate, I wanted to switch my runed totem staff from one character to
another. I logged and came back in and guess what? The RTS was gone.
lovely

So, my poor wizard on Povar who needed a break cause he is seriously poor is
now even more screwed because I have to pay for a new RTS.

Sentinall

-----Original Message-----
From: Chas Watkins [mailto:cwatkins@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 3:16 PM
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'; 'eqenchanters@onelist.com';
'eqrangers@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Looting LORE items


From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>

With the introduction of LORE items. That is the No drop/No trade items.

If you are in a PvP /Duel situation and you lose can the winner loot LORE
items from your corpse.

Does anyone know if the following are lore items

Emperor Crush's armor
Screaming Mace

Does anyone have a definitive answer for what makes an item a lore item. Is
it a quest item or merely a special drop item.

Thanks

Chas
